block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 25 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. The Flying Bat designed by Max Hulme. We are 25% done of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge!!! This plane needs to be release really high. It will dive and glide just like a bat. It is 2020 October 27, just in time for Halloween. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 024 : Shuttlecock by Michael G. LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/qaaBMV0rFG0 Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching. Wilson Lee
